newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Consorcio ARA downgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Consorcio ARA downgraded.

text.p: Valores Finamex said Thursday it downgraded Consorcio ARA to market performer from buy given the strong performance of the share in the past seven months.
-- "Since its IPO, the stock price has incrased 65.6 percent in dollar terms."
-- "Although at 27.7 pesos the price is still five percent below our target, we believe current volatile market conditions and the low marketability of the share justitify the downgrade," it said.
-- Valores said it expected the company's shares "will settle down and move more in line with the market."
-- "On a longer term basis, we maintain positive expectations for the company's shares," Valores said.
